attributes.additional_details:
Professor Jay's Report - dated 21.8.14

Dame Louise Casey's Report on 4 2.15

Voices of Despair Voices of Hope - published on 28.2.15
attributes.background:
The Rotherham CSE disaster was a personal tragedy for thousands of children and family members and is of major national and international significance. 

We call on the government to establish a Rotherham Independent Panel to oversee a disclosure process about the historical failings.

rejection.details:
There is already an Independent Inquiry on Child Sexual Abuse, so we're not sure what else you'd like to happen. 

The Inquiry has announced that it is considering information from Rotherham as part of its investigation. 

You can find out more about the Inquiry here:

https://www.iicsa.org.uk/
